attributes.action: Simplify Motor Insurance Charges and Fees
attributes.additional_details:
Insurance policies are becoming too complex with scandalous hidden fees and cancellation charges. The industry must be regulated properly. How is it fair for an insurer to discriminate on sex and age when this would not be allowed in any other area of society?

How can it be more expensive to cancel a policy than to let it lapse?

How can an email a five minute (charged for) conversation cost £35?

Insurance costs are ever increasing and the consumer is receiving an appalling deal.
